title: Which Champion do you Identify as?
body:
So this may be a quieter topic since people may not have thought about this before or the people that have are on the quieter side of the boards.

Personally I want to be/am like Ekko. I've loved him since release and I was never really sure why until recently. I noticed during a game that I Ekko requires a lot of forethought and familiarity to play well. Then I realized that I was like this in real life, I always want to know whats going on when deciding whether or not to get involved with things. Not just that but I am like to think of myself as a decent former athlete and the mobility that Ekko has makes me think that he would also make a good track athlete. And finally the second chance. The arguably broken part of his kit that more people dislike than like. I always wish to have a second chance since I am pretty socially awkward and usually mess up conversations with people I find cute and would take on a date given the opportunity. 

I'm not sure if I like Ekko because he is what I wanted to be or if Ekko had an imprint on my personality to the point where I became more like a fictional character. 

So my question to you board reader is which champion is most like you and do you like them because they are like you or did you become more like the champion?

replies.body: Aatrox: Useless and a waste of time.
Damn it, you beat me to it...
